meta.title: Stop Emotional Eating | Chat with Your AI Guide and Analyze Your Habits
meta.description: Discover why you eat when you're not hungry by chatting daily with your AI guide. Identify your patterns, get daily challenges, and start transforming your relationship with food. Start for free.
meta.ogTitle: Understand Your Eating Habits | Daily Challenges with AI
meta.ogDescription: Chat daily with your AI guide to understand your eating patterns, discover triggers, and receive challenges that actually work.

hero.headline: Stop Emotional Eating for Good
hero.subheadline: Talk to your AI guide every day. Find out what's really driving your eating habits and get daily challenges that work to change your relationship with food.

howItWorks.title: How It Works in 3 Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple process to understand your habits and start making real changes

step1.title: Talk to Your Guide
step1.description: Have a natural conversation about how you're feeling, what you're craving, and what situations make you want to eat. No forms or complicated questions. Just an honest chat.

step2.title: See What's Really Going On
step2.description: Your AI guide analyzes what you share and finds patterns you might have missed. You'll discover what's actually behind your eating habits.

step3.title: Take Action with Daily Challenges
step3.description: Every day you get challenges designed specifically for you based on what the AI has found. Complete them, see your progress, and notice how your relationship with food starts to change.

features.title: What You Get
features.subtitle: Tools designed to help you understand your habits and create real change

feature1.title: Find Patterns You Can't See
feature1.description: Your AI guide spots connections between your emotions and eating habits that you probably haven't noticed. You'll know exactly what drives you to eat and when.

feature2.title: Challenges That Actually Work
feature2.description: No generic advice. Every day you get 5 challenges created just for you, based on your own patterns. They're designed to break habits that don't serve you and strengthen the ones that do.

feature3.title: See Your Real Progress
feature3.description: Watch yourself change day by day. You can review past conversations and see every small step forward. Every step moves you closer to a healthier relationship with food.

feature4.title: Advice Tailored to You
feature4.description: You won't find generic recommendations here. Your AI guide gives you guidance based on your actual situation, what's happening in your life, and your specific needs.

feature5.title: Know the Why
feature5.description: Every challenge has a reason tied to your habits. You'll see how your patterns connect to your goals, giving meaning to every action you take.

feature6.title: Complete Privacy
feature6.description: What you share stays yours. We use the same level of security banks use to protect your conversations. We never sell or share your data with anyone.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started

question1.a: Yes, completely. We use the same type of encryption banks use to protect everything you share. Your conversations are private and we never sell or share them with third parties. What you tell the AI stays with the AI.

question2.a: Think of it like having a friend who pays close attention and notices things you don't see. Your AI guide analyzes your daily conversations, finds what's driving your habits, and gives you specific challenges to create real change.

question3.a: We have flexible plans for different needs. You can try all the features and pick the plan that works best for you right in the app.

question4.q: I'm not good at journaling. Will this work for me?
question4.a: This isn't a traditional journal. It's more like talking to someone about your day. Just share what happened, how you felt, and what you ate. The AI asks helpful questions to guide the conversation.

question5.a: It includes daily conversations with AI, challenges based on your habits, advice tailored to your situation, and complete progress tracking so you can see how you're improving.

question6.a: No, and we're upfront about that. EmotionEat helps you understand your patterns and build better habits, but it's not a therapist. If you have a serious eating disorder, please consult a healthcare professional. We're here to support you, not replace professional care.

cta.title: Ready to Change Your Relationship with Food?
cta.subtitle: Start understanding your eating habits today, one conversation at a time

footer.tagline: Helping you build a healthier relationship with food, day by day.
